/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by tall buildings on both sides, their facades painted in shades of brown and gray, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the man-made structures below. On the right side of the street, trees can be seen, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The street itself is lined with cars and trucks, indicative of the city's bustling activity. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the details and colors within the scene.
